story.book

Class Illustration

  • java.lang.Object
    • story.book.Illustration
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the content to be held by the Illustration.
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextIllustration

    public abstract class Illustration
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for Illustrations. Extend to implement different types of Illustrations for different forms of media.
    Author:
    Alexander Cheung

      Sets the content of the Illustration to object of type T.
